name: Fallen London: Fine Dining
storyline: It's opening night at Dolly's, one of London's most exclusive restaurants. The critics are in, pens sharpened to make mincemeat of the new set menu. Tempers will fray; pots will boil. Can you survive a night in the kitchen? You'll have to wait for the reviews to come in...
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2020. The second entry in the Season of Animals.
